content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello there, thank you for considering my property for rental. I understand that my apartment is quite small at 25 square meters, but I am confident that with the right tenant, I can maximize my profits. In terms of rental price, I am open to negotiation, but I am looking for a fair price that will allow me to make a reasonable profit. Would you be able to provide me with some information about yourself and your rental history so we can discuss this further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. How much are you looking for?
name: Max Müller

content: I appreciate your honesty and I understand that as a student, you may be looking for a lower rental price. I will consider your application and your ability to pay the rent on time. As for the rental price, I am looking for a fair and reasonable amount that will allow me to make a profit while also being affordable for you. Could you please provide me with some information about your current living situation and your budget so we can discuss this further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have been living alone in a small apartment for the past year. I have been paying my rent on time and I have excellent credit. I have a budget of 700 euros per month. Is that enough for you?

My current apartment has a security deposit of 1000 euros, which I would like to keep as much as possible.

You mentioned that you are looking for a fair and reasonable rent. Is that still the case?

Do you have any other requirements or expectations?

Please let me know if you would like me to provide any additional information.

Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Max Müller
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for providing that information, Max. I appreciate your honesty and I understand that you are looking for an affordable rental option. Based on your budget and the security deposit you would like to keep, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price to make it more affordable for you. I do require a security deposit, but I am willing to work with you to find a reasonable amount that works for both of us. In terms of my expectations, I would like to see that you are a responsible tenant who pays rent on time and takes care of the property. If you have any additional information that you would like to provide, please let me know. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to ask one more question. When would you like me to move in and out of the apartment?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Max Müller
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your question, Max. I am flexible with move-in and move-out dates, but I would prefer if you could sign the lease and pay the security deposit as soon as possible so that we can finalize the rental agreement. Once that is done, you can move in at your convenience. As for move-out dates, I would like to see that you give me at least two months' notice so that I can find a new tenant. Please let me know if you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can do to assist you with the rental process.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I am willing to sign the lease and pay the security deposit as soon as possible. I am also willing to give you two months' notice if I decide to move out.

Thank you for considering my application and for your understanding. I appreciate your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Max Müller
name: Max Müller

content: You're welcome, Max. I appreciate your prompt response and your willingness to meet my requirements. Please let me know if you have any other questions or if there is anything else I can do to assist you with the rental process. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
